Description: AWS CloudFormation Template: Tableau Server Cluster running on Linux (CentOS/Ubuntu).

AcceptEULA.default: Accept Tableau End User License Agreement

SSLCertificateARN.default: SSL Certificate ARN (Requires matching DNS name)

WorkerCount.default: Number of additional Tableau Server instances

AMIOS.Description: The Linux distribution for the AMI to be used for the EC2 instances

AWSHostedZoneID.Description: DNS Zone ID to contain the cluster's DNS entry (blank = no DNS)

AWSPublicFQDN.Description: Tableau Server portal will be reachable at this address (blank = no DNS)

AcceptEULA.Description: View the EULA at the Link: https://www.tableau.com/eula

ExistingSecurityGroup.Description: Provide an existing security group or leave blank for creating a new one

IPAddress.Description: Provide an Elastic IP address (EIP) for the initial node (blank = no EIP)

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

KeyPairName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.
KeyPairName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances

SSLCertificateARN.Description: The Amazon Resource Name for the existing SSL cert you wish to use; empty for none

SourceCIDR.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
SourceCIDR.Description: IP address/range to allow access from

TableauServerAdminPassword.Description: The password of the initial administrator for Tableau Server

TableauServerAdminUser.Description: The name of the initial administrator for Tableau Server

Username.Description: Tableau Services Manager (TSM) administrator username (cannot be 'tableau' or 'tsmagent' or 'admin' or 'root')

VpcId.Description: The ID of the VPC into which to deploy the cluster

AMI.CENTOS7HVM: CentOS Linux 7 x86_64 HVM EBS ENA 1803_01-b7ee8a69-ee97-4a49-9e68-afaee216db2e-ami-8274d6ff.4

Fn::Join: // For Delete requests, immediately send a SUCCESS response.
var ec2 = new aws.EC2({ region: e.ResourceProperties.Region });
// Get VPCs with the specified id
err = err || (data.Vpcs.length !== 1 ? 'DescribeVpcs returned ' + data.Vpcs.length + ' results.' : undefined);
// Send response to the pre-signed S3 URL
Reason: 'See the details in CloudWatch Log Stream: ' + c.logStreamName,
c.done(); // Tell AWS Lambda function execution is done
c.done(); // Tell AWS Lambda function execution is done
tsm topology list-nodes -u "$tsm_admin_user" -p "$tsm_admin_pass" | while read p; do

printf "
Match User $tsm_admin_user
  ForceCommand internal-sftp
  ChrootDirectory /restricted
  PasswordAuthentication yes
  AllowTcpForwarding no
  PermitTunnel no
  X11Forwarding no
" >>/etc/ssh/sshd_config

GroupDescription.Fn::Sub: Enable HTTP access via ports 80 and HTTPS access on port 8850, and SSH access from the provided network CIDR, plus all access from within the VPC

Fn::Join: # Wait for Primary (use a random sleep to split up the requests and avoid throttling)

LoadBalancerDNSName.Description: Direct DNS name of load balancer

TableauServerURL.Description: Public DNS name to reach cluster

SecurityGroup.Description: The security group the instances belong to
